languages.text: "Мои сопровождающие получили приказ от своего командира остановить движение и дождаться соединения с вашей группой. А затем, ввиду своей некомпетентности, дали себя убить. Это прискорбно осложнило мою задачу". {n}Если в голосе техножреца и было сочувствие погибшим, ни одна ее нотка не прозвучала в сухих словах из вокс-системы.{/n}

"My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мои сопровождающие получили приказ от своего командира остановить движение и дождаться соединения с вашей группой. А затем, ввиду своей некомпетентности, дали себя убить. Это прискорбно осложнило мою задачу". {n}Если в голосе техножреца и было сочувствие погибшим, ни одна ее нотка не прозвучала в сухих словах из вокс-системы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves get killed. It was a deplorable complication to my task." {n}Even if the Tech-Priest's voice did carry any compassion for the dead, the dry words that came out of the vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

"My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves get killed. It was a deplorable complication to my task." {n}Even if the Tech-Priest's voice did carry any compassion for the dead, the dry words that came out of the vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

"My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was a deplorable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

"My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was a deplorable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

"My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

languages.text: “他们的指挥官命令我的护卫队停止行动，等待与你的队伍汇合。然而，那些人却过于无能，丢了性命，这为我的任务带来了不可接受的麻烦。”{n}就算这位技术神甫心中真的带着那么一丝对死者的怜悯，从他的音阵合成器中传出来的话语听起来也是干巴巴的，完全不带丝毫感情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们的指挥官命令我的护卫队停止行动，等待与你的队伍汇合。然而，那些人却过于无能，丢了性命，这为我的任务带来了不可接受的麻烦。”{n}就算这位技术祭司心中真的带着那么一丝对死者的怜悯，从他的音阵合成器中传出来的话语听起来也是干巴巴的，完全不带丝毫感情。{/n}

languages.text: «El comandante ordenó a mi escolta detener su movimiento y esperar para unirse a su grupo. Después, debido a su incompetencia, consiguieron que los mataran. Fue una complicación inaceptable para mi tarea». {n}Si la voz del tecnosacerdote contenía algún tipo de compasión por los caídos, las palabras secas que emite su sistema de voco no han transmitido ni un ápice de ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El comandante ordenó a mi escolta detener su movimiento y esperar para unirse a su grupo. Después, debido a su incompetencia, consiguieron que los mataran. Fue una complicación inaceptable para mi tarea». {n}Si la voz del tecnosacerdote contenía algún tipo de compasión por los caídos, las palabras secas que emite su sistema de voco no han transmitido ni un ápice de ella.{/n}

languages.text: 「自分の護衛団は、移動を中止して陛下の一行と合流するために待機するよう司令に命じられました。その後、護衛どもは無能さゆえに自ら命を奪われる羽目になったのです。おかげで自分の仕事はとてつもなく厄介になってしまいました」{n}技術司祭の言葉に死者への哀れみが含まれていたとしても、ヴォクス・システムからパチパチ鳴る辛辣な言葉には、わずかにもその響きが反映されていなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の護衛団は、移動を中止してあなたの一行と合流するために待機するよう司令に命じられた。その後、護衛どもは無能さゆえに自ら命を断ってしまったのだ。おかげで私の仕事はとてつもなく厄介になってしまったよ」{n}技術司祭の声に死者への哀れみがあれば、ヴォクス・システムからパチパチ鳴る辛辣な言葉にも、わずかながらその響きが乗っただろう。{/n}

languages.text: « Le commandant de mon escorte a donné l'ordre aux gardes de rester en position et d'attendre de se joindre à votre groupe, mais leur incompétence a entraîné leur mort, ce qui a compliqué ma mission de façon inacceptable. » {n}Si la voix du technoprêtre pouvait laisser paraître une once de compassion, les mots secs crachés par son système-vox en sont exempts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le commandant de mon escorte a donné l'ordre aux gardes de rester en position et d'attendre de se joindre à votre groupe, mais leur incompétence a entraîné leur mort, ce qui a compliqué ma mission de façon inacceptable. » {n}Si la voix du technoprêtre pouvait laisser paraître une once de compassion, les mots secs crachés par son système-vox en sont exempts.{/n}

languages.text: "Meine Eskorte erhielt von ihrem Commander den Befehl, nicht weiterzuziehen, sondern auf den Zusammenschluss mit Eurer Gruppe zu warten. Aufgrund ihrer Inkompetenz haben sie sich dann töten lassen. Eine inakzeptable Verkomplizierung meiner Aufgabe." {n}Sollte die Stimme des Techpriesters irgendein Mitgefühl für die Toten enthalten haben, so war in den kalten Worten aus seinem Voxsystem jedenfalls nichts davon zu spüren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meine Eskorte erhielt von ihrem Commander den Befehl, nicht weiterzuziehen, sondern auf den Zusammenschluss mit Eurer Gruppe zu warten. Aufgrund ihrer Inkompetenz haben sie sich dann töten lassen. Eine inakzeptable Verkomplizierung meiner Aufgabe." {n}Sollte die Stimme des Techpriesters irgendein Mitgefühl für die Toten enthalten haben, so war in den kalten Worten aus seinem Voxsystem jedenfalls nichts davon zu spüren.{/n}

Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

languages.text: "Bana eşlik edenler, komutanlarından beklemeleri ve grubunuzla birleşmeleri yönünde emir aldı ancak beceriksizliklerinden ötürü kendi sonlarını getirdiler. Bundan dolayı da vazifem kabul edilemez raddede güç bir hâl aldı." {n}Tekno Rahip, ölenlere dair bir merhamet besliyor olsa bile, voks sisteminden hışırtıyla çıkan ruhsuz kelimelerde o duygudan eser bulunmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My escort was ordered by their commander to discontinue their movement and await to be merged with your group. Then, due to their incompetence, they let themselves be killed. It was an unacceptable complication to my task." {n}If the Tech-Priest's voice carried any compassion for the dead, the dry words that crackled from his vox-system did not convey a shred of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bana eşlik edenler, komutanlarından beklemeleri ve grubunuzla birleşmeleri yönünde emir aldı ancak beceriksizliklerinden ötürü kendi sonlarını getirdiler. Bundan dolayı da vazifem kabul edilemez raddede güç bir hâl aldı." {n}Tekno Rahip, ölenlere dair bir merhamet besliyor olsa bile, voks sisteminden hışırtıyla çıkan ruhsuz kelimelerde o duygudan eser bulunmuyor.{/n}
